column5: Has anyone ever been on Nungesser Lake. I seen on the net Goose Bay Camp has three boat in cabins. Looking for another location to go to start going up twice each year. Thanks for the info. You can e-mail me or post. Either way works for me. Thanks Again.Odie

I will also be going to Nungesser Lake the first week of August. Will be staying at Birch Point Camp. This is my first Canada trip and I'm really looking forward to it. When are you going? To anyone who has fished this lake before, What is the bait/lure and presentation that has worked well? What could we expect the weather to be like? Thanks for the info.
could you please let me know how you did atnungesser. am thinking about going there.thanks
